Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Eidenhoft Boulevard, just to the south of the intersection with Lelion Way to the north and east of the Lithium Bay Tours office.
Room.LongDescription: The Lithium Bay Tours office provides guided tours of the Lithium Inlet and the various rivers which run into the bay, including some detailed schematics of the Lyanden Lake. On the east side of the road is the Fairy Dust Inn, where a number of sailors and other sea-going people often spend the night.
